name: Xtrem: No Breaks
description:
A simple retro game made in 15 minutes.Expect a lot of bugs.

I released this game for all those old game lovers.

To unpack this game you will need WinRar and if you don't gave it you can download it here : http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Let me know if you would want me to continue this project or just end it.

I was thinking about ending it.

I will be releasing game assets (2D,3D,Envoirement etc.)
